groupon.chemBnbText: ChemBnB is a group buying brand under OKCHEM. It is launched to gather the buying crowd of the same chemical products and help the purchasers get stronger bargain power. By offering the chemicals from renowned suppliers, ChemBnB can help the group buyers get high quality products at lower price.
groupon.fob-info: The FOB price is subject to the payment of T/T in advance. Prices will vary under other delivery and payment terms.
groupon.priceInfo: The price status is based on the online application quantity, and the deal price will be confirmed according to the final order quantity. OKCHEM reserves the right of final explanation.
groupon.discountRule01: 1. The first 20 orders will get another $10/Mt off on the final price.
groupon.discountRule02: 2. Customer with the (product) annual purchase larger than 1000 mt, can be rewarded with a seven-day round trip to China for two, or awards worth to $6,000.
groupon.discountRule03: 3. Orders applied before Dec.29 will get another $5/Mt off on the final price.
groupon.discountRule04: 4. Customer can get a $5/mt commission based on the referrals’ order quantity.
groupon.discountRule05: 5. Group buyers ordering our junior, senior and ultimate membership can have an extra sourcing service, a 5% off, and a 10% off respectively.
groupon.discountRuleInfo: OKCHEM reserves the right of final explanation.
groupon.question01: Q1. What is group buying? What’s the benefit for buyer?
groupon.answer01: A: Group buying is to gather the buyer crowd together and increase their bargain power for the top-level brand products.
groupon.question02: Q2. What kinds of package can you provide?
groupon.answer02: A: We can provide 25KGS/Bag, Carton Box, Jumbo Bag and Drum.
groupon.question03: Q3. When will be your shipment date after we sign the contract?
groupon.answer03: A: Usually 20 days after the contract signed. But if there is unexpected reason leading the shipment delayed, we will inform you in advance.
groupon.question04: Q4. What is the Minimum Quantity if I want to place an order?
groupon.question05: Q5. What is your loading port? Can you ship it from Shanghai Port?
groupon.answer05: A: We suggest loading from Tianjin Port. It is more convenient with less cost. If you require other loading port, we can also support.
groupon.question06: Q6. How many kinds of xanthan gum you could offer?
groupon.answer06: A: We could offer Industrial grade, Food grade.
groupon.question07: Q7. Can you make long-term contract? My company always prefer order by quarter or half year.
groupon.answer07: A: Yes we can. At present, we can support long-term contract within 3 months.
groupon.question08: Q8. Could you provide other payment terms
groupon.answer08: A: Yes. We can. Pls contact Michael Xu, Tel: +86-57128180366, E-mail:michael.xu@okchem.com, Cell Phone:+8613867456419
groupon.question09: Q9. Can you provide other brands?
groupon.answer09: A: Yes. We will schedule multiple group buying, please pay attention to our ChemBnB.
